definition: according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: More than 500 sea turtles died in the spill area.
sentences.chinese: 据统计，在泄露海域有超过500只海龟死亡。

sentences.english: According to statistics, the population of China's post-80s generation is over 200 million.
sentences.chinese: 据统计，中国80后一代人口数量已超过2亿。

sentences.english: Statistically total direct economical losses reach over 800 million RMB.
sentences.chinese: 据统计，全校直接经济损失达到8亿余元。
据统计，大部分男人都会软下来。

sentences.english: According to statistics, the population of China`s post-80s generation is over 200 million. The media usually refers to them as "slaves" to property, credit cards, children and marriage.
sentences.chinese: 据统计，中国80后一代人口数量已超过2亿。

sentences.english: Official statistics also show that the first half year saw rising prices for Beijing's residential houses.
sentences.chinese: 另据统计，今年上半年住宅成交均价呈直线上扬趋势。

sentences.english: This amounts to two reported bear-inflicted injuries per year.
sentences.chinese: 据统计每年有两起黑熊袭人至伤的报道。

sentences.english: According to statistics, Zhi appears as much as 1,900 times.
sentences.chinese: 据统计，全书共出现“之”字一千九百多次。

sentences.english: According to statistics, yearly output yield of cranberries is something around 600 kilos per hectare.
sentences.chinese: 据统计，蔓越莓年产量每公顷大约600公斤。

sentences.english: According to statistics, "Three Violations" is the main criminal and disasters of accidents.
sentences.chinese: 据统计，“三违”是安全生产事故的主要罪魁祸首。

sentences.english: Coccidiosis causes economic lossess of billions of dollars annually in China.
sentences.chinese: 据统计鸡球虫每年给我国养鸡业造成数十亿元损失。

sentences.english: Statistics show that the mortality among abandoned children is fifty-five per cent.
sentences.chinese: 据统计，被遗弃的孩子的死亡率是百分之五十五。

sentences.english: According to statistics, the earthquake killed a total of eight people in Nepal lives.
sentences.chinese: 据统计，地震在尼泊尔共夺去8人的性命。

sentences.english: According to statistic, use a network the earliest to judge one of province that coil as the country.
sentences.chinese: 据统计，作为国家最早使用网络评卷的省份之一。

definition: to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
person-times/visits/classifier for number of people participating
year after year/with each passing year/over the years
to take possession of/to occupy/to take up
common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
to close/to stop/to put a stop to sth/cut-off point/stopping point/deadline
